description: Housed in the Casa Baglioni hotel, a beautiful Art Nouveau building dating from 1913, this restaurant has a contemporary feel with an elegant dining room featuring colourful armchairs. The cuisine is precise and distinctive, with a harmonious balance of traditional and innovative flavours thanks to the top-quality ingredients used. The wine list is also top-notch, featuring excellent Italian and international wines, including some rare and exclusive labels. An interesting business lunch is available at midday, while the Rooftop Bar on the seventh floor boasts 360° views of Milan and serves a selection of aperitifs designed especially by the chefs (open daily from 6pm-1am).
facilitiesServices: ['Air conditioning', 'Interesting wine list', 'Restaurant offering vegetarian menus']
